QUESTION: Behold, all souls are mine; as the soul of the father, so also the soul of the son is mine: the soul that sinneth, it shall die.
For I have no pleasure in the death of him that dieth, saith the Lord God: wherefore turn yourselves, and live ye.
And he said unto me, Prophesy upon these bones, and say unto them, O ye dry bones, hear the word of the Lord.
